com.captcha.botdetect.web.servlet
Class SimpleCaptcha

java.lang.Object
  com.captcha.botdetect.web.servlet.SimpleCaptcha

public class SimpleCaptcha
extends java.lang.Object

This class builds upon the general SimpleCaptcha functionality in SimpleCaptchaBase, and abstracts functionality common to different possible kinds of SimpleCaptcha controls.
